item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 1, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Ryujinx (Nintendo Switch emulator) has been removed from GitHub (89 points | 26 comments)
2. Is the world really running out of sand? (181 points | 68 comments)
3. OpenAI DevDay 2024 live blog (48 points | 3 comments)
4. Sorry, GenAI is NOT going to 10x computer programming (15 points | 6 comments)
5. Quake runs in just 276 kB RAM on the Arduino Nano Matter board (30 points | 1 comment)
6. The $1k Wheelchair (12 points | 4 comments)
7. ESO telescope captures the most detailed infrared map of the Milky Way (195 points | 45 comments)
8. Launch HN: Quetzal (YC S24) – Stripe for Internationalization (3 points | 1 comment)
9. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (October 2024) (104 points | 108 comments)
10. Comparing our Rust-based indexing and querying pipeline to Langchain (69 points | 34 comments)
11. Show HN: A real time AI video agent with under 1 second of latency (118 points | 60 comments)
12. Boris Vallejo and the pixel art of the demoscene (436 points | 104 comments)
13. Comedy Theory (2022) (203 points | 139 comments)
14. Bop Spotter (2271 points | 365 comments)
15. Ask HN: How to deal with AI generated sloppy code (50 points | 30 comments)
16. NewsCatcher News API (YC S22) Is Hiring ( | hide)
17. Ask HN: Who wants to be hired? (October 2024) (54 points | 129 comments)
18. Hasbro's Trademark for the Smell of Play-Doh (2018) (36 points | 35 comments)
19. Show HN: Sourcebot, an open-source Sourcegraph alternative (17 points | 3 comments)
20. Pro bettors disguising themselves as gambling addicts (126 points | 126 comments)
21. The Netherlands has returned some stolen artifacts to Indonesia (129 points | 113 comments)
22. Gorhill pulls uBlock Origin Lite from Firefox store (107 points | 210 comments)
23. Ask HN: Should you reply STOP to unwanted texts? (220 points | 293 comments)
24. Earth has caught a 'second moon' (20 points | 21 comments)
25. Show HN: qrframe – generate beautiful qr codes with javascript code (360 points | 53 comments)
26. PS5 Dashboards Flooded with Unwanted Ads–Sony Claims It Wasn't Intentional (58 points | 57 comments)
27. Essential node in global semiconductor supply chain hit by Hurricane Helene (208 points | 53 comments)
28. Better privacy can be one click away. Google and Apple won't allow it (48 points | 18 comments)
29. Show HN: 73,530 free book summaries in 40 languages (with paid audio) (3 points | 1 comment)
30. Sea robins use leg-like fins to taste, navigate seafloor, researchers discover (41 points | 7 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 1, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
